website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a remarkably breathable sun hat will appreciate this breezy option.
pros: Packable material offers supreme portability for traveling
Customers appreciate how well the hat stays in place
cons: A few complaints that hat is too big

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hat. It's substantial and the brin is firm ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hat. It's substantial and the brin is firm (but "moldable"), unlike the brims of other hats I've worn. Took it out on a hike in 90 degree heat over the weekend and it remained comfortably cool. Size-wise, I'm at about 23 1/4 inches and the large fit me snugly but comfortably. Just what I was looking for. The only caveat I have is that the brim is pretty wide - good for protecting you from the sun but you may look a little goofy unless you curl/shape the edges a little.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dresslar

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong...Henschel Hats are some of the best out there!
customer_reviews.text: I have another Henschel Breezer Hat and really love it. Beware that the size you order may give you some problems, but remember...this is just the way it goes with hats. I use it primarily for vacation time which is quite a bit these days, as I am retired. It is essential to have a hat like this on hot sunny days. Buy it you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great summer work hat!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. I wear it as my summer work hat every 6 days a week in the summer. I like the nice wide brim and the vented area and it looks good as well. It stands up to wearing it for work usually 2-3 seasons which I think is very good. I throw it in the wash 2-3 times each summer to keep it looking decent. I think it is a durable and a good value! Thanks Henschel!
customer_reviews.author: BRET MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Good Warm Weather Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: It is a good hat and I like the color, also. On the other hand, I considered returning it—-not due to the quality but simply because it is a bit stiffer than I had hoped. I was looking for something more flexible and perhaps just a tiny bit shorter in it’s height. Decided finally to keep it for yard working. Because of its size in crown height and brim, I think it would look better on a tall person. The size offers good Sun protection but might somewhat dwarf a shorter person.
customer_reviews.author: Henry the Bird

customer_reviews.title: a good packable hat for a safari, breathable
customer_reviews.text: Taking this on a safari to Kenya. Only sizes available are: S, M, L. I ordered a size L with a 3" brim. Large fits a little loose but chin strap helps keep it secured on my head. likes: breathable, foldable, looks good, 3" brim is perfect improvements: only folded this flat, would have been helpful to have instructions showing how to fold or how many folds it can handle before losing its shape. Also, having a packing bag/storage bag would be useful.
customer_reviews.author: pacifico

customer_reviews.title: Just a little too big.
customer_reviews.text: I'm guessing with infinite head sizes it's hard to fit everyone. But this hat fits just a little too large for me. I wish manufacturers would provide some sort of shim or something like that to help adjust the head band. Otherwise, the hat does a great job of keeping the sun off my face and neck while allowing air flow through the vented sides. The top is solid and does keep the direct sun off of your head. I spend a lot of time on mowers and tractors and I'm still looking for that perfect hat. (One that keeps you cool, absorbs sweat, and blocks the sun.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat
customer_reviews.text: It's a great hat and definitely keeps the sun off my head and neck. The fit is a little tighter than it should be but not enough that I won't wear it. It actually is pretty comfortable if a little tight. I wouldn't crush it or pack it, though. Nice hat.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Miller Jr.

customer_reviews.title: from yard work to the Appalachian Trail I've worn and loved this hat
customer_reviews.text: I own this hat for over 2 years now. From the beach to the boat, from yard work to the Appalachian Trail I've worn and loved this hat. Purchased this one as a gift to my father who loves it as well. Classy and rugged. U can wad this thing up and stuff it in a pack, pull it out and it wears like new. Amazing quality. They do fit snuggly at first but a little break in period accompanied by sweat, water or rain and it will fit perfectly to your melon.
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Freaking love this hat, blew off in the wind and didn’t have ut winched down had to buy another. Made in USA!
customer_reviews.author: blgarris

customer_reviews.title: Great construction, fit a little off.
customer_reviews.text: The material and construction is excellent. Purchased a large and the size is a little big. Typically this size fits me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: SVB

customer_reviews.title: A little small, but otherwise very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was slightly smaller than I expected. I stretched it out and it fit somewhat, but was still pretty tight. Despite that, this is a good quality hat and I may buy another, one size up, for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: wordnerd64

customer_reviews.title: A good stable hat good for summer camping
customer_reviews.text: Kept my bald head well protected at camp well enough. A treatment with Permethrin made the hat that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Muad'Dib

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking hat
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful hat, but the large size was a bit bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: ken hartman

customer_reviews.title: Love the hat ordered it in a medium was too ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat ordered it in a medium was too small that the large only little bit too big I put the hat reducer in it and it fits perfect now stays on my head in really windy days
customer_reviews.author: wzilla

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a large, received medium
customer_reviews.text: Hat looks fine but it won’t fit on my head. I purchased this for a vacation and now I’ll have to figure something else out. It would be great if somebody could fix this error.
customer_reviews.author: devon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hat. I have several colors and wear everyday. I am a dog walker on Florida and this provides the protection I need with the cool mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Ricoman

customer_reviews.title: This hat was great. Worked so well in the Redding CA heat
customer_reviews.text: This hat was great. Worked so well in the Redding CA heat. Excellent sun protection but breathed well. High quality hat that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and keeps the sun off my face an head and not too hot
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing it daily since received, really like it, seems well made and it works for what I wanted, fits tight enough I do not need strap unless really windy.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Quick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat. It stands up, and does not fall down flat on your head like some other hats like this. Very good quality product. The fit is just a tiny bit bigger than most other larges that I buy, but not much.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, keeps head cool
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this hat. He puts a netting over it and uses it when gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H.

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit and look-sturdy too!
customer_reviews.text: Great hat! Still haven't worn mine though! Hope it's as cool when I need it!
customer_reviews.author: mr blue

customer_reviews.title: good hat, to small
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality but the size was way to small. I will have to go to a XXL for fit.
customer_reviews.author: Handtman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Aussie Headgear
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, well made (in the USA), fits well and I've gotten lots of compliments. A few have even asked where I got it. Not is it cool, but it's really cool and we'll vented. Best hat ever, I love it. Great customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ed Norred

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Wear it all the time playing golf in Texas, Well made and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Monet S.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the next size and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband needs for the beach. First one ordered according to size chart on website. It was too small. Ordered the next size and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, great price! !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, we will have to see how packable it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: j.j.

customer_reviews.title: works great in high winds on the
customer_reviews.text: High quality. works great in high winds on the boat
customer_reviews.author: Jay S.Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Herschel 5310 Hat
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Comfortable and feels light weight, but it stays put on my head in the wind. It provides the protection I need for working outdoors. I will be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat is amazing! It provides great sun protection at soccer, the beach, and the boat!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Groover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat for hiking. Comfortable and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat - Ideal for Safari
customer_reviews.text: Wore this on a 2 week Safari in South Africa. Great Sun protection and yet still cool to wear. It is crushable and rode in the bottom of my duffle flattened to Africa and back. When I took it out it returned to shape with no indication it had been flattened. It looks great in my pictures from the trip. To size, go to the Henschel site and read their instructions. Measure your head with a tape and don't rely on what size you have purchased other hats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great Hat!!! Bought as a birthday present for my brother. He loves it! Great color and style! Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Bradley

customer_reviews.title: good hat
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this hat, use it as a summer work hat on the farm and hunting. good hat.
customer_reviews.author: David E Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: hat was a little tight, but figure it may stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: The large is a little small and the XL was WAY to big!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the hot sun in Texas. Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Great Source From Which to Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great hat; follow size chart carefully to make sure you order properly.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Lazarus

customer_reviews.title: color online is off
customer_reviews.text: The hat is much darker green than the picture showed online. I wanted a lighter color, but hat works for the use I have.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Puga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast on time shipping great quality the size is a little off
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hat, holds up well, fits a little tighter than the same brand different color I bought last fall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Deal

customer_reviews.title: seems a little large than other Henschel hats I have ...
customer_reviews.text: seems a little large than other Henschel hats I have bought. Tried the next size down and it was way too small
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Herschel makes the best wide brim hats on the market, good quality at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Hat
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the sun off, but still lets in the breezes. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: buddy

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful hat and it fits awesome but I received a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful hat and it fits awesome but I received a crushed and I'm having a hard time getting the wrinkles out of it
customer_reviews.author: David  Casey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the hat but the medium was too small. How can I return it?
customer_reviews.author: Kim Shortridge

product_meta.title: Henschel Hats Aussie Breezer 5310 Cotton Mesh Distress Gold Hat
product_meta.description:
HENSCHEL HATS AUSSIE BREEZER 5310 COTTON MESH HAT

The Henschel Aussie Breezer Hat is the ultimate hat for the great outdoors. It's constructed of lightweight polycotton with a mesh crown for breathability in the heat. 
Protect yourself from the sun with the UPF 50+ rating and the large 3 - inch brim. 
The hat includes a chin cord that provides a secure fit and prevents loss on a windy day. The hat is also crushable and packable and features 1- inch self-band that holds the hat together and makes traveling easy. 
Ideal for all outdoor activities such as hiking, fishing and camping. 

ABOUT US

Henschel Hat Company is a manufacturer of fine headwear in the USA since 1947. It stays committed to manufacturing superior products made in the USA.
The pinched fronts, relaxed feel on your head and the plaited bands are Henschel signature traits.
The Breezer Hats combine varieties of fabrics and colors with mesh to create the newest design and style sought after in the headwear business. Great for all outdoor activities.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
The wide, 3 inch brim will keep the sun out of your eyes
Crushable and packable with the 1 inch self-band
